title: League of Legends new client needs to show SKINS OWNED.
body:
I often play get bored of playing the same champions over and over again, and want to play some other ones that I have skins for to get the skins out for a tumble, but often I forget what skins I actually own.

Would Riot be able to implement a feature (under collections would be fitting) to show ALL of the skins I actually own? I understand you can do this in shops but it does not show legacy skins, and it also shows all the ones you don't own so you have to scroll through all of them!
